room_title: Escape room "Dr. Kâ€™s Lethal Injection" by Escape LOU in Louisville
review: Too much fun! Went to experience the new room at Escape LOU last night with 7 other folks. The mission as CDC agents is to find the formula of the evil Dr. K to save the world from a deadly virus. The lobby is welcoming and the staff exceptional. Our host Will was welcoming and called us each by name, taking the time to make each of us feel welcome.We escaped cutting in close, but hey, that made it more exciting I have been to experience the other two rooms and was not successful in escaping either of those but again had a good time enjoying the experience with friends.
